strings:
<voice_0x01001CDA><se_high>Princess Medea: (Sob, sob...)
Oh, is that you, <hero>?

<voice_0x01001CDB><se_high>Princess Medea: I'm sorry.
I didn't want you to have to see me crying.

<voice_0x01001CDC><se_high>Princess Medea: It's just that I can't get Marta out of my mind.
She was such a lovely old lady...

<voice_0x01001CDD><se_high>Princess Medea: But we should try not to dwell on it.
We have so little time together...
Let's talk about happier things.

<voice_0x01001CDE><se_high>Princess Medea: That was the first time I've ever seen snow!
It was so beautiful. Like a giant, fluffy white blanket...
<voice_0x01001CDF><se_high>Princess Medea: If we played hide-and-seek, you'd never be able to find me! I'm so white as a horse.
<voice_0x01001CE0><se_high>Princess Medea: Don't forget to take me to the spring now and then. I miss talking to you, <hero>...
